    Projects

    Project Name Description
    360X Research Paper I co-authored a research paper on the design of a 360-degree-video platform interface. This paper was presented on April 2019 at the CHIUXID19 Conference held in Bali, Indonesia. The full paper is available for free here.
    COMET Front-End Development Workshop I co-taught a basic front-end development workshop for the Center for Complexity and Emerging Technologies (COMET) Lab at De LaSalle University, Manila. I created most of the materials used for the workshop available here.
